DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effects of 8 weeks of treatment with mirtazapine on alcohol consumption in alcohol high consuming men. This study is a randomized, double-blind placebo controlled clinical trial with parallel group design(N=59).
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Mirtazapine Versus Placebo on Alcohol Consumption in Male Alcohol High Consumers
DOC.criteria: 1865 years of age male sex alcohol high consumption signed informed consent psychiatric disorders (except nicotine and alcohol dependence) severe somatic disorders inadequate knowledge of the Swedish language
